column2: ENGLISH
I've had my eye on [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for some time. Now that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has taken over, it may not be as well defended as before.
Commander, give the order to strike!
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! attacks §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
We won't attack [From.GetTitledFirstName] yet.

My brother has been defeated and his war is over. He never did realize that he was a mere pawn in my greater scheme. With him out of the way and the loyalists bloodied, now is the time to capture [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for myself!

I expected the situation in [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to be more turbulent by now. I didn't plan it this way, but [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s guard seems to be down. I may be able to take over the realm if I strike quickly.
Commander, lead your knights to victory!
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! declares war on §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]§!
I can't afford to rush this. I'll make my move later.

[From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName] wrote to us some time ago, asking for [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s support in the civil war [From.GetSheHe] planned to start. [From.GetFirstName] has finally made [From.GetHerHis] move and will be expecting our reinforcements soon.
[From.GetHerHisCap] enemies will fall before us.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! provides the §YBeige Ritter§! to §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! for [From.GetHerHis] war. §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will owe §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! a favor.
Let [From.GetHerHim] stand or fall on [From.GetHerHis] own.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I believe you could use some reinforcements. The Beige Ritter stands ready to make your enemies fall from the sky. All I ask in exchange is a favor. 
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Those knights are impressive. I welcome your aid.
I do not need your help.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Thank you for your offer, but I believe my own armies are sufficient to achieve victory.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I see.
This will eventually start the Light Inheritor event chain.
But it's not written yet...
